name: platformgame
description: A platform game made with HTML5 and ran with Electron

scripts.win32: del /s /q out && cp -r src/view/ out && babel src -d out && electron .
scripts.unix: rm -rf out; mkdir out; cp -r src/view/ out/; babel src -d out; electron .
scripts.win32-test: del /s /q out && cp -r src/view/ out && babel src -d out && electron .
scripts.linux-test: rm -rf out; mkdir out; cp -r src/view/ out/; babel src -d out;

author: platformgame
